info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Executes a shifting operation of 'offset' bits inside the measure array using the 'filling' character.
[Parameters] - input data type : not used. - output data type : not used. - measure : input measure. - offset : specify the number of 1-bit movements. If offset>0 then shift to the right. If offset<0 then shift to the left. Default value (0) corresponds to no shift. - filling : filling character, 0 (default) or 1.
[Return type] Bit-array.
[Examples] Execute a 10-bit shift to the right. oph_bit_shift('','',bit_measure,10)
